battleTraits.name: Ethereal
battleTraits.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls (positive and negative) for friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** units, excluding **Nagash**.

battleTraits.name: Discorporate

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared an ATTACK ability

note.title: Used By:
note.text: A friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit targeted by that **ATTACK** ability.

battleTraits.effect: That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the phase.

battleTraits.name: Shriek

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that has not used an **AURA OF DREAD** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target. The number of models in the friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit must be greater than the number of models in the target unit.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target's attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Wave of Terror

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

battleTraits.effect: Friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** units that are in combat can use **CHARGE** abilities this phase. However, if a unit that is in combat uses a **CHARGE** ability and the charge roll is 3 or less, that unit does not count as having charged that turn.

battleTraits.name: Stun

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WAR MACHINE** or **CAVALRY** unit that has not used an **AURA OF DREAD** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Petrify

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase

battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT HERO** that has not used an **AURA OF DREAD** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: There is no Escape
abilities.effect: Friendly Nighthaunt units can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run or Retreat ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on friendly Nighthaunt units by Retreat abilities.

spells.name: Shademist
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that has 3 or more models and is wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Nightmare Lantern
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Nighthaunt units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Keeper of Mortality
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly Nighthaunt unit within 3" of this Manifestation to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for target for the rest of the turn.
• Heal (3) the target.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Cursed Soul.

abilities.name: Staring Death In The Face

header.text: Once Per Turn, Any Combat Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the target is a Hero, subtract 5 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: If I Cannot Rule, None Shall Rule!

header.text: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a command for a unit within 12" of this unit

abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, unless your opponent spends 1 additional command point to use that command, the command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.

abilities.name: Spell-eaters

header.text: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability

abilities.effect: If a friendly Nighthaunt unit wholly within 12" of this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, this unit can use the ‘Unbind’ ability as if it had Wizard (1). Add 1 to the unbinding roll for that ability. If the spell is unbound, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster.

abilities.name: Siphon Souls
abilities.effect: Each time a model (friendly or enemy) is slain within 12" of this Manifestation, give this Manifestation a soul point, to a maximum of 6.

abilities.name: Soul Eruption
abilities.declare: If this Manifestation has 6 soul points, pick any number of enemy units within 6" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, reset this Manifestation’s soul points to 0.

abilities.name: Empowered Through Excruciation
abilities.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to each friendly Nighthaunt unit wholly within 12" of this unit in each phase.

abilities.name: Light A Pyre
abilities.declare: If this unit is contesting an objective, pick a visible enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Add a number equal to the roll to this unit’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Spectral Hunters
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

meleeWeapons.name: Ethereal Steed’s Ghostly Hooves and Teeth

abilities.name: Thrashing Desperation
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Drawn to War
abilities.effect: Friendly Nighthaunt Infantry Heroes have Ward (4+) while they are wholly within this unit’s combat range.

abilities.name: Spectral Bolts
abilities.effect: This unit can pick enemy units to be the targets of shooting attacks even if they are not visible to this unit. In addition, ignore negative modifiers to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Cursed Soul.

abilities.name: Sentenced to Eternal Torment

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target has the Sentenced keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Judge, Jury and Executioner

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Your Turn

abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each Sentenced enemy unit on the battlefield. On a 4+, inflict an amount of mortal damage equal to the current battle round number on that Sentenced unit.

abilities.name: No Rest for the Wicked

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick any number of friendly Nighthaunt units on the battlefield to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For each target, you can return a number of slain models to that unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to D3+3.

abilities.name: Grief-stricken
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Ignore positive modifiers to hit rolls, wound rolls and save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Mortarch  of Grief
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Reaped Like Corn
abilities.effect: This unit’s combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ while the target unit has 5 or more models.

abilities.name: Captured Soul Energy
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly Nighthaunt unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Furious Indictment
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target is condemned until the start of your next turn. 

While a unit is condemned:

• Halve that unit’s Move characteristic.
• That unit cannot use Retreat abilities.
• Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for that unit, to a minimum of 1.

profile.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Cursed Soul.

abilities.name: Eager Death-dealers
abilities.effect: While this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly Grimghast Reapers while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Murderous Bloodlust
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks while it is in combat with any damaged enemy units or while it is in combat with any enemy units that had any models slain in the same turn.

abilities.name: Harrowing Shriek
abilities.effect: If this unit charged in the same turn, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.

abilities.name: The Point of Death
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has the Stalked keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Unerring Hunters

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Charge ability for this unit and a Stalked enemy unit is within 12" of it

abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for this unit made as part of that ability, but this unit must end the move in combat with the Stalked enemy unit.

abilities.name: Ghostly Howl

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s Piercing Scream to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target cannot use commands until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Cacophony of Sorrow
abilities.effect: While there are any friendly Myrmourn Banshees units wholly within 12" of this unit, ignore positive modifiers to the control scores of enemy units within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Nimbus of Power
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Runaway Coach
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage equal on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Evocation of Death
abilities.declare: If this unit destroyed any enemy units this turn, pick a friendly non‑Unique Nighthaunt Hero that has been destroyed.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit wholly within 12" of this unit. The replacement unit can only be set up in combat with enemy units that are in combat with this unit.

meleeWeapons.name: Ethereal Steeds’ Ghostly Hooves and Teeth

abilities.name: Soul Reaper
abilities.effect: Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this Manifestation’s Almighty Reap if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Corpse Candles
abilities.declare: Pick either this unit or a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Allocate 1 damage point to the target.

If you picked an enemy unit, add 1 to casting rolls for this unit for the rest of the turn.

If you picked this unit, for the rest of the turn:
• Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit.
• Add 1 to this unit’s power level.

abilities.name: Wraithstorm
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If any models are slain by this ability, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Grim Justice
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made with this unit’s Fellreaper if the target is a Priest or a Wizard.

abilities.name: Infantry Overseer

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Nighthaunt Infantry unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stolen Hours
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, after that Fight ability has been resolved, Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of damage points allocated to enemy units by combat attacks made as part of that Fight ability.

abilities.name: Phantasmal Discorporation
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Curse of Loyalty
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, add 3 to the control scores of friendly Nighthaunt units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

meleeWeapons.name: Ethereal Steed’s Ghostly Hooves and Teeth

abilities.name: Passage Through The Underworlds

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase

abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, pick a friendly non-Hero Nighthaunt unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit and the target from the battlefield, then set them up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of each other and more than 7" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Undead

header.text: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero non-Unique Death unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: The Staff of Power
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

abilities.name: Invocation of Nagash
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly Death unit, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.
• The target has Ward (5+) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Hand of Dust

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn

abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy Hero or Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

warscrolls.name: Knight of Shrouds on Ethereal Steed

abilities.name: Cavalry Overseer

header.text: Reaction: You declared a Fight ability for this unit

abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-Hero Nighthaunt Cavalry or War Machine unit that has not used a Fight ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a Fight ability immediately after the Fight ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Stolen Hours
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Fight ability, after that Fight ability has been resolved, Heal (X) this unit, where X is the number of damage points allocated to enemy units by combat attacks made as part of that Fight ability.

meleeWeapons.name: Ethereal Steed’s Ghostly Hooves and Teeth

abilities.name: Chilling Horde
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s combat attacks if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: Another Link in the Chain
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is wholly within 12" of any friendly Spirit Torments. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Nighthaunt units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: The Briar Queen
abilities.effect: While this unit’s Briar Queen is on the battlefield, it has Wizard (1).

abilities.name: Ghostly Howl

header.text: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase

abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s Piercing Scream to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target cannot use commands until the start of your next turn.
